Modernize This!

Supporting government, nonprofit, and social enterprise IT shops looking to modernize technical practices and bring culture along for the ride

Get Started


flash_on

Deliver Value Faster

You solve important problems every day. You're on a mission. I'm here to help you provide modern, cloud-ready services to the people you serve - faster and more reliably than ever before.

group

Gain Rapid Feedback

Being agile means being responsive to the needs of your customers. I'll provide creative methods for you to get feedback from your most important customers - your users.

replay

Build, Measure, Learn, Celebrate!

I'll introduce ideas for keeping work fun and collaborative while constantly improving performance. After all, shipping code feels good!

About Me:

My name is Alexia. I'm a state employee, an engineer, a tinkerer, an analyst, and a dreamer - and I'm here to make things better.
